sections.heading: Noncompliance not to affect validity of loan6-910
sections.text: Noncompliance not to affect validity of loanA failure to comply with this article does not affect the validity or enforceability of any debt, mortgage, deed of trust or any other lien interest on real estate. A person acquiring a mortgage loan or any
